Palladium

Palladium

Name: Palladium

Formula: Pd

Atomic Number: 46

Group: 10

Block: d

Relative Atomic Mass: 106.42

Discovery Date: 1803

Appearance: A shiny, silvery-white metal.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Belt Buckles
  • Dental Crowns
